text: BTW, none of this would've been necessary if the browser devs had been willing to work with me, but that's been the story of "RSS" -- people blazing their own trails for no good reason or possible gain instead of cooperating. What I'm doing now in 2022, almost twenty years after RSS 2.0, is cleaning up the messes, the best I can. I figure after 20 years no one can complain that they were going to do it if I had just waited. :smile:
